dict.acceptation: 样品，华样；标本，榜样；（化验的）取样；[信]信号瞬时值；
取…的样品，尤指用样品来检验；品尝；抽样调查；

sent.orig: SAMPLE experiment as part of language syntax analysis of the achievement.
sent.trans: 词法分析中2．实验内容SAMPLE语言语法分析部分的实现。

sent.orig: Eight, design SAMPLE language grammar, semantic analyzer, the output quaternion type of intermediate results.
sent.trans: 设计SAMPLE语言的语法、语义分析器，输出四元式的中间结果。

sent.orig: Lead lab team to develop Production Sample, Special Makeup Sample, Promotion Sample and Sales Sample, etc.
sent.trans: 带领实验室人员完成生产样，特殊样，促销样及销售样。

sent.orig: Maintain sample level in sample room to ensure availability of sample any-time for AFICO customers.
sent.trans: 坚持样本的程度，在样本室，以确保供给样品任何的时光，afico的顾客。

sent.orig: The sample is free of charge.(The sample will be sent free of charge).
